thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 18 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Singapore Exchange Updates on India Equity Derivatives

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Singapore Exchange Updates on India Equity Derivatives
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Singapore Exchange Ltd:
* ‍WILL LIST SUCCESSOR PRODUCTS TO ITS SGX NIFTY FAMILY OF PRODUCTS BEFORE AUGUST 2018​
* ‍SGX NIFTY FAMILY OF PRODUCTS CAN CONTINUE TO LIST, TRADE AND CLEAR UNINTERRUPTED ON SGX UNTIL AUGUST 2018 AT A MINIMUM​
* WILL CONTINUE WORK WITH NSE TO DEVELOP LINK TO ALLOW INTERNATIONAL MARKET PARTICIPANTS TO TRADE ON NSE‘S INTERNATIONAL EXCHANGE​
* MARKET PARTICIPANTS TO BE ABLE TO TRANSITION TO SUCCESSOR PRODUCTS BEFORE EXPIRY OF SGX‘S LICENCE DEAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
